Instance Method# append(_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func append(_ publisher: Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>) -> Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `RangeReplaceableCollection` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/append(_:)-3dj6k#see-also)
